overview:
ClearCenter provides an open service delivery platform to meet the IT needs of small businesses and distributed environments

ClearOS is an integrated software distribution that includes everything for a small IT environment from file storage to cloud based services with an intuitive management console. ClearOS has been deployed in over 118,000 sites in 80 countries and 21.

ClearSDN is a global service delivery network with seamless integration into ClearOS. ClearSDN offers a partner portal that enables software updates, new features and modules, advanced documentation, technical support and cloud based services such as remote server backup.

ClearOS and ClearSDN were initially developed in the labs at Point Clark Networks. The solution was designed to combine an simple Linux based server/gateway software distribution (historically know as ClarkConnect) with value-added services.

ClearCenter acquired both Point Clark Networks and its ClarkConnect Linux distribution in 2009.
